name: Clean-O-Droid
description:
It's the future and the oceans are ruined. As a droid you have to clean the sea from trash. You can recycle 5 trash to upgrade your robot and be more efficient

--How to play--

Arrow key to move

Move on a trash to grab it and drag it to the center off the screen

Click on an upgrade to spend 5 trash to upgrade your robot:

White to upgrade your speed, Blue to upgrade your load capacity and Green to add a mini robot to assist you

This game was made for the sea jam
